reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at the Courtyard from June 17-20 2006. We were visiting Newport for our Anniversary. This is a great location when visiting Newport as it is only 5 minutes from Newport and in an area full of restaurants and other shopping if needed. The room was clean and the $8.95 breakfast buffet was very good. It included waffles, bagels, toast, yogurt, eggs cooked to order, bacon fruit and several other items. It was very convenient so we ate there each morning. While the room was very clean it was on the small side (see picture). The pool which is both indoor and outdoor was also very nice. There also was a hottub. I would recommend this hotel for a trip to Newport.
reviews.title: Great place to stay when visiting Newport

reviews.text: We have stayed at the Newport Marriott and Newport Harbor Hotel & Marina. Neither is as good as the Courtyard in Middletown, RI. It is about 10 minutes out of Newport. The rooms, bed and bathrooms were clean, spacious, comfortable and remarkably quiet. A combination indoor/outdoor pool was very nice. The breakfast buffet offered a reasonable selection and was only $8.95 (it's double at the Newport Marriott). Free parking. Friendly and attentive staff. We were impressed when we saw the hotel General Manager, Patti O'Brien, helping to serve breakfast - - it showed a very guest oriented approach to service. Other hotels should take lessons from the Middletown, RI Courtyard.
reviews.title: Great hotel close to Newport

reviews.text: This Courtyard is a pretty good value for visitors looking for a hotel close to newport but don't want to spend more than $300 a night. I have stayed here twice, once in 2005 and once in 2003.
reviews.title: Decent hotel close to Newport

reviews.text: The room was clean as was the swimming pool. Newport is just a short car ride or cab away.
reviews.title: Perfect stay at the Courtyard!
Great location and reasonable
reviews.text: My only gripe is the mattress was lumpy and worn, however I saw the staff replacing 2 mattresses on our last day so perhaps this issue is already being addressed.

reviews.title: a nice deal
reviews.text: Took part in weekend getaway deal and found it to be a very reasonable value. The room itself was very ordinary but was clean. There was a urine odor in the bathroom although the floor and toilet was clean, could not figure that out.

reviews.title: Very pleasant and so close to Newport!!
reviews.text: The weekend getaway including a set of 4 free tickets to various Newport attractions, ie mansions, wineries, etc. We also got a full breakfast buffet which was adequate.
Very convenient to drive into Newport, about three miles down the road. I would stay there again
